name: Spike Packrat, Alpha Demo
description:
A homage/parody of PS1 platformers and 90's attitude. Run and jump all around, help Spike collect all the Kahuna Crystals, and free your fellow critters from the sinister cybernetics of Dr. Teddy.

Control with keyboard and mouse, or XBox controller.

NOTICE: This alpha build may be buggy on 32 bit systems.

MUSIC
"Aces High", "Chee Zee Jungle", "Chee Zee Lab", "Noise Attack", "Nowhere Land", "Pump Sting", "Surf Shimmy"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
